label: ball
caption: A black dog, its tongue hanging out in excitement, has just successfully caught a tennis ball in mid-air with his jaws, while a white dog stands nearby, watching with eager interest as if waiting for its turn to play. The two dogs are likely playing a game of catch in a sunny park or backyard on a warm day. The grass is probably lush and green under their paws, with a few scattered leaves from the surrounding trees adding some natural color to the scene.
